Determine pathological effect paclitaxel radiation locally advance breast cancer . OUTLINE : This nonrandomized , dual institution study . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour twice week total 8 week . This start within 1 week tumor biopsy . Patients receive radiotherapy 5 days/week 5.0 week within 1 week first paclitaxel dose . Operable patient progressive disease therapy undergo modify radical mastectomy ( MRM ) , receive 4 course doxorubicin IV cyclophosphamide IV , administer every 21 day . Inoperable patient receive chemotherapy regimen , reevaluate surgery . Patients stable disease respond paclitaxel/radiation regimen undergo MRM , receive 4 course doxorubicin IV paclitaxel IV ( 3 hour ) every 21 day . All patient hormone receptor positive tumor receive tamoxifen 5 year therapy complete . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 40 patient ( 20 patient per institution ) accrue 18- 24 month .
